structure.unit: ARTICLE CLV. BONITA ESTATES MANSIONS SOUTH STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: The installation of such street lighting project will be accomplished pursuant to an agreement between Miami-Dade County and the Florida Power & Light Company. The expected cost of furnishing electric energy to the street lighting project, together with the costs of service, maintenance, and administration for handling billing, collecting assessments, and processing for the first year is estimated to be $14,892.71 and shall be advanced by petitioners. The expected cost of furnishing electric energy to the street lighting project, together with the costs of service, maintenance, and administration for handling billing, collecting assessments, and processing for the second year is estimated to be $5,507.33. The expected cost per assessable front foot of real property within the proposed district for the second year is estimated to be $2.0413. The succeeding years' assessments will be adjusted based on actual costs.
